import{createStyles,Toolbar,Typography,Input,withStyles}from"@material-ui/core";import SearchIcon from'@material-ui/icons/Search';import React from"react";var chatToolbarStyles=createStyles({chatToolbarRoot:{color:'#FFF',margin:'8px',minHeight:'32px',backgroundColor:'#0377ad',//'#0595DD', //'#23232F',
borderRadius:'2px'},innerContent:{width:'100%'},chatTitle:{margin:'0 auto'},searchWrapper:{backgroundColor:'#025279',borderRadius:'3px',border:'solid 1px #025279',color:'#FFF',margin:'5px'},searchInput:{width:'180px',paddingLeft:'8px',transition:'width 300ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) 0ms','&::placeholder':{color:'#FFF',opacity:1},'&:focus':{width:'300px'}},searchIcon:{color:'#FFF',marginTop:'3px'}});var ChatToolbar=function ChatToolbar(props){var classes=props.classes;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Toolbar,{disableGutters:true,className:classes.chatToolbarRoot},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Typography,{className:classes.chatTitle,color:"inherit"},"Now talking in \"Wonderful Chatroom\""),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Input,{classes:{root:classes.searchWrapper,input:classes.searchInput},disableUnderline:true,placeholder:'Search',endAdornment:/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(SearchIcon,{className:classes.searchIcon})}));};export default withStyles(chatToolbarStyles)(ChatToolbar);
